divs: Sighting Detailswhen I was in the park for a walk then suddenlly a disc flew over my head then I called my friend over to the park then they shot mini misiles at us about 5 in. and 4in. fat.then my freind danny and me bought our paint ball guns then started shooting the UFO then it was going after us then we hid in the boys bathroom. then I saw the ship door open then i went in then ran back out then shot the inside about 20 times tnen a alien came outthen i froze with fear.then about 20 mins. later it left andten came back.5 mins later after it left other ufo'sabout 3 came and then while it left we started shooting the ufo.
Summary: the ufo was parked in th park.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in La Mesa
There were no other sightings in La Mesa on or around December 27th 2006
